name: RetrieveSyncReport
description:
Retrieve report data synchronously with Ashby.

Call this tool to retrieve report data synchronously using Ashby's reportSynchronous endpoint. Use it when a quick report access is needed and is within the provided time constraints and limits. For longer or more resource-intensive reports, consider using asynchronous alternatives.

parameters.name: report_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object containing 'reportId' for the report request and 'includeHeadersInData' to specify inclusion of column headers in the data array.

includeHeadersInData.description: When true (default), column headers are included as the first row in the data array. When false, headers are only in the columnNames property.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API

includeHeadersInData.description: When true (default), column headers are included as the first row in the data array. When false, headers are only in the columnNames property.
